EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for attending The Art of Effective Test Data Design
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Art of Effective Test Data Design
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for attending our webinar, The Art of Effective Test Data Design! We hope you found the webinar informative and helpful.
Click here <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/> for a recording of this and other webinars.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Ingo Philipp Product Manager, Tosca Optimize Tricentis
